histore.document.csv.writer module¶

Writer for CSV documents.

class histore.document.csv.writer.CSVWriter(filename: str, delim: Optional[str] = None, compressed: Optional[bool] = None, encoding: Optional[str] = None, none_as: Optional[str] = None)¶

Bases: object

Context manager for an open CSV file writer.

close()¶

Close the associated file handle and set it to None (to avoid repeated attempts to close an already closed file).

write(row: List[Union[int, float, str, datetime.datetime]])¶

Write a row to the CSV file.

Parameters

row (list) – List of cell values for a dataset row.
